articles.title: 5 things to know about Falcons before Sunday’s game vs. Patriots
articles.description:
The Falcons enter Sunday's matchup with a 3-4 record as they hope to spark a playoff run.

The post 5 things to know about Falcons before Sunday’s game vs. Patriots appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: The Falcons, with a 3-4 record, aim for a playoff push against the Patriots.
Sunday's game is crucial for both teams' playoff aspirations in the NFL.
Boston residents can expect heightened local interest and fan engagement during the matchup.
